column1: Note:Continuousvariableswereanalyzedwithatwo-groupANOVA,F(1,212);categoricalvariablesandexperimental-group versuscontrol-groupdatawereanalyzedwithachi-squaretest(df= 1).Allpvaluesaretwo-tailed.Standarddeviationsare giveninparentheses.AUDIT =AlcoholUseDisordersIdentificationTest(Saunders,Aasland,Babor,delaFuente,& Grant, 1993);BDI= BeckDepressionInventory(Hautzinger,Bailer,W orall,& Keller,1994);SCL-90-R = Symptom Checklist-90-Revised (Franke,1995). ^{aEducationlevelwasscoredonascalefrom 1(onlyprimaryschool)to5(finisheduniversity).}
